name: The Town Where We Met (Gameplay Prototype)
name_original: The Town Where We Met (Gameplay Prototype)
description:
Hello!

The Town Where We Met is a life and farm simulation game made in RPG Maker and taking inspiration from similar titles in the genre.

This prototype is to test the base gameplay mechanics of the game such as farming, fishing, mining, cooking, foraging, crafting and decorating.

So naturally, most (if not all) graphics are placeholders, so don't pay too much attention to that. I would like to gather feedback on the flow of the game mechanics as they stand right now.

Currently the game has the following features fully implemented for you to test:

  • Farming
  • Animal Care
  • Beekeeping
  • Foraging
  • Fishing
  • Mining
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Decorating

As of today the game is being worked on by a solo developer and it's not expected to have a full release anytime soon. I'm just working on this in my spare time and I'm doing it for fun and from a place of love for life and farming sim games.

Please send any relevant feedback to my email jomiancu@gmail.com or contact me on Twitter @jomiancu.

Thank you so much for taking the time to play this prototype, and have fun!

Z/Enter: Confirm
X/Esc: Cancel/Use Tools/Use Item
C: Put item away
S: Menu
D: Open inventory
Q: Tool bar (Switch left)
W: Tool bar (Switch right)
Arrow Keys: Movement
Shift: Toggle Dash
